name: ENGAGE
abstract: ENGAGE is a metaverse platform designed for professionals. Through metaworlds, they can transform how people collaborate globally by harnessing the powers of immersive technologies

detail.app_languages: Simplified Chinese, English, Korean, Spanish, Traditional Chinese, French, Japanese, German
detail.app_release_note:
NEW

- Added the Connections system, which enables users to connect with each other so they can more easily interact on the platform.
- Added the ability to invite a connection to the Session that youâ€™re in, and to request to join a Session that a connection is in. 
- Added support for two-factor authentication.
- Added support for Italian.

IMPROVED

- Removed the restriction on the number of full-body avatars.
- Improved avatar display names.
- Moved the My Avatar link to the user menu in the upper-right corner of the menu screen.
- Renamed the Users page of the in-Session menu to Host Controls and restricted access to hosts only.
- Users can now see notifications outside of Sessions.
- Implemented a new invite user panel.
- Changed the remember me setting to expire after 30 days.

FIXED

- Fixed an issue that prevented a user from accepting or rejecting cookies when they used the in-application web browser to access the Google Images page.
detail.app_supported_platforms: PICO G2, PICO G2 4k, PICO Neo2, PICO Neo3 Link, PICO 4E, PICO G3, PICO Neo3 Eye, PICO Neo3 Pro, PICO Neo2 Lite, PICO Neo, PICO Neo2 Eye, PICO 4, PICO Neo2 Wigig, PICO 4 Pro
